headline: Can PPL's Clean Energy Strategy Drive Growth & Grid Resilience?
summary: PPL is expanding its renewable energy focus while lifting its stock above peers.

headline: What to Expect From PPL Corporation's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: PPL Corporation will release its second-quarter earnings next week, and analysts anticipate the bottom line to remain unchanged year-over-year.

headline: Biggest US Power Sale to Offer Glimpse of AI’s Cost to Consumers
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The biggest and most closely watched US power auction is set to offer an early glimpse of what the AI boom will cost consumers.
